description:
The records in the Data Asset Collection needs to contain certain fields
to easily query and index the data.

_id.description: The unique id of the data asset.
_id.title: Data Asset ID

created.description: The utc date and time the data asset created.
created.title: Created

last_modified.description: The utc date and time that the data asset was last modified.
last_modified.title: Last Modified

location.description: Current location of the data asset.
location.title: Location

external_links.description: Links to the data asset on different platforms.
external_links.title: External Links

data_description.description: A logical collection of data files.
data_description.title: Data Description

procedures.description: All procedures performed on a subject.
procedures.title: Procedures

instrument.description: Instrument, which is a collection of devices
instrument.title: Instrument

title: Metadata
